      • getRemoteWebDriver

        public static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getRemoteWebDriver(Browser browser,
                                                               String browserVersion,
                                                               org.openqa.selenium.Platform platform,
                                                               URL remoteUrl)
        Function to return the RemoteWebDriver object based on the parameters passed
        Parameters:
        browser - The Browser to be used for the test execution
        browserVersion - The browser version to be used for the test execution
        platform - The Platform to be used for the test execution
        remoteUrl - The URL of the remote machine to be used for the test execution
        Returns:
        The corresponding RemoteWebDriver object

                                                               URL remoteUrl)

      • getEmulatedWebDriver

        public static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getEmulatedWebDriver(String deviceName)
        Function to return the ChromeDriver object emulating the device specified by the user
        Parameters:
        deviceName - The name of the device to be emulated (check Chrome Dev Tools for a list of available devices)
        Returns:
        The corresponding ChromeDriver object

      • getEmulatedRemoteWebDriver

        public static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getEmulatedRemoteWebDriver(String deviceName,
                                                                       URL remoteUrl)
        Function to return the RemoteWebDriver object emulating the device specified by the user
        Parameters:
        deviceName - The name of the device to be emulated (check Chrome Dev Tools for a list of available devices)
        remoteUrl - The URL of the remote machine to be used for the test execution
        Returns:
        The corresponding RemoteWebDriver object

      • getEmulatedWebDriver

        public static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getEmulatedWebDriver(int deviceWidth,
                                                                 int deviceHeight,
                                                                 float devicePixelRatio,
                                                                 String userAgent)
        Function to return the ChromeDriver object emulating the device attributes specified by the user
        Parameters:
        deviceWidth - The width of the device to be emulated (in pixels)
        deviceHeight - The height of the device to be emulated (in pixels)
        devicePixelRatio - The device's pixel ratio
        userAgent - The user agent string
        Returns:
        The corresponding ChromeDriver object

      • getEmulatedRemoteWebDriver

        public static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getEmulatedRemoteWebDriver(int deviceWidth,
                                                                       int deviceHeight,
                                                                       float devicePixelRatio,
                                                                       String userAgent,
                                                                       URL remoteUrl)
        Function to return the RemoteWebDriver object emulating the device attributes specified by the user
        Parameters:
        deviceWidth - The width of the device to be emulated (in pixels)
        deviceHeight - The height of the device to be emulated (in pixels)
        devicePixelRatio - The device's pixel ratio
        userAgent - The user agent string
        remoteUrl - The URL of the remote machine to be used for the test execution
        Returns:
        The corresponding RemoteWebDriver object
